direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle string manipulation and null checks with similar control flows.
Both methods return string representations, with getDescription() providing a part of the string returned by toString().
Both methods return string representations, with getSince() providing a part of the string returned by toString().
Both methods contribute to the string representation, with isForRemoval() affecting the output of toString().
